channel.title: Decimation - Webclient - Just Pking (Previous owner of Deci 508 / D-Z317)
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2wq6crt.gif[/img]
[COLOR="silver"]Notice:[/COLOR]
[ul]I have just began on this source, it is based on Project Insanity and I know I have not done alot of changes to it yet.[/ul]
[ul]There will be changes done to it as time goes on, if you've played my previous Decimation servers (My 508 or 317), or D-Z317, you know what I am capable of.[/ul]
[ul]This will not contain PvP Armour such as Morrigans/Zuriels/Statius/Vesta but will contain some other new school items[/ul]
[ul]NEW HITS ARE TOGGLEABLE WITH ::HITSOFF AND ::HITSON!!!![/ul]
[size=18pt][url=http://koshmar-deci.com/webclient/]http://koshmar-deci.com/webclient][/url][/size]
Downloadable:
[size=18pt][url=http://download.koshmar-deci.com]http://download.koshmar-deci.com[/url][/size]
Webclient options on load-up
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/21mzy1i.jpg[/img]
[SIZE="5"]Media:[/SIZE]
Starter: (2 per ip)
[img]http://imgur.com/xT7vY.png[/img]
Shops:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/20im8k.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/3840/101022203950.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/1769/101022212406.png[/img]

[img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/6950/101022205639.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/3157/101022202221f.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/9877/101022202251p.png[/img]

item.title: Decimation - Webclient - Just Pking (Previous owner of Deci 508 / D-Z317)
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Topic updated

reyx7:

I like it so far. Why did you hit a 116?

New hits, your hits are showed but shown as the hit x10, you can turn that off with ::hitsoff

xaves:

fix money colours, add shadow…

Fixed money colors

DylanYo:

I like the SOL

thanks

Read full topic
